vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.27;
son of: Joktan (H3355);
brother of: Almodad (H0486), Sheleph (H8026), Hazarmaveth (H2700), Jerah (H3392), Uzal (H0187), Diklah (H1853), Obal (H5745), Abimael (H0039), Sheba (H7614H), Ophir (H0211), Havilah (H2341I) and Jobab (H3103)
§ Hadoram = "noble honour"
1) the 5th son of Joktan, an Arabian tribe
2) a son of Tou, king of Hamath, was his father's ambassador to congratulate David on his victory over Hadarezer, king of Zobah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Joctán; descendiente de Sem; (b)   hombre
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈多蘭 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "尊貴的榮譽"
1) 約坍的第五個兒子 (創10:27;代上1:21)
2) 哈馬王陀烏的兒子, 他曾擔任他父親的大使, 去向大衛王恭賀其擊敗瑣巴王哈大利謝{#代上 18:10|}
3) 大衛, 所羅門, 羅波安時代掌管服苦的監督官; 也叫 'Adoniram' 和 'Adoram'{#代下 10:18|}
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
哈多兰 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "尊贵的荣誉"
1) 约坍的第五个儿子 (创10:27;代上1:21)
2) 哈马王陀乌的儿子, 他曾担任他父亲的大使, 去向大卫王恭贺其击败琐巴王哈大利谢{#代上 18:10|}
3) 大卫, 所罗门, 罗波安时代掌管服苦的监督官; 也叫 'Adoniram' 和 'Adoram'{#代下 10:18|}

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.20.24;
son of: Abda (H5653); also called Adoniram at 1Ki.4.6; 5.14; Hadoram at 2Ch.10.18;
Another name of a.do.ram (אֲדֹרָם "Adoram" H0151)
§ Hadoram = "noble honour"
1) the 5th son of Joktan
2) a son of Tou, king of Hamath, was his father's ambassador to congratulate David on his victory over Hadarezer, king of Zobah
3) the intendant of taxes under David, Solomon, and Rehoboam; called also 'Adoniram' and 'Adoram'
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijo de Abdá; funcionario; en tiempos de los reyes David y Salomón

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.8.10;
son of: Toi (H8583); also called Hadoram at 1Ch.18.10;
Another name of yo.ram (יוֹרָם "Joram" H3141)
§ Hadoram = "noble honour"
1) the 5th son of Joktan
2) a son of Tou, king of Hamath, was his father's ambassador to congratulate David on his victory over Hadarezer, king of Zobah
3) the intendant of taxes under David, Solomon, and Rehoboam; called also 'Adoniram' and 'Adoram'
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijo de Abdá; funcionario; en tiempos de los reyes David y Salomón
